Text:
i have blocked your img host due popups on there
if you want to share your uploads then it is fine by us.
If you however are uploading in order to cash in using image host with popups/etc then you are not welcome here.

If you want a img host then TPB runs one and it is free:

http://bayimg.com/

another one, clean and free:

http://imgbox.com

there are more if you use google
i will remove popads from my imghost pls unblock it

i am in a good mood so i'll remove the block in good faith that you clean up your host.
However i will say this now so it would not be any suprise to you that i will keep my eye on you and if you have again filled with your img host with popups/etc then you will not no longer get warned but a nice clean ban from TPB and all your torrents removed.
ok i will take care from now onwards and will remove popads from the host
hey MOD i need some time to fix all this up...some time = 12 hrs and in 12 hrs popads will be out of my host and thanks a lot for unblock
